statements: SELECT * FROM email_campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, email_subject, send_date FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE open_rate >= 10.00;
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM email_campaign_performance ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, send_date FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate < 5.00 ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, send_date FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE open_rate > 20 AND click_through_rate > 10 ORDER BY send_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT campaign_name, email_subject, open_rate FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE send_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY open_rate DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate < 5 AND campaign_name LIKE '%promotion%' ORDER BY click_through_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE open_rate BETWEEN 10 AND 25 AND click_through_rate >= 15 ORDER BY open_rate DESC, click_through_rate ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT campaign_name, send_date, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY send_date
SELECT * FROM campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, open_rate FROM campaigns WHERE open_rate > 0.5
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC
SELECT subscriber_id, email FROM subscribers WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM campaigns WHERE click_through_rate > 0.3
SELECT campaign_name, open_rate FROM campaigns WHERE open_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY open_rate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, subscription_date, status FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date <= '2021-10-31' ORDER BY subscription_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%promotion%' ORDER BY campaign_id ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY last_opened_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, last_opened_date, last_clicked_date FROM subscribers WHERE last_opened_date > last_clicked_date ORDER BY last_opened_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM open_rates;
SELECT campaign_id, open_date, open_count FROM open_rates WHERE open_count > 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, click_date, click_count FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_count < 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM open_rates WHERE open_count > 10 ORDER BY open_date DESC, email_address ASC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(open_count) AS total_opens FROM open_rates GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_opens > 100 ORDER BY total_opens DESC

SELECT campaigns.campaign_name, open_rates.email_address FROM open_rates INNER JOIN campaigns ON open_rates.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE campaigns.start_date < '2022-01-01' AND open_rates.open_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, COUNT(email_address) AS unique_emails FROM open_rates GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY unique_emails DESC, campaign_id
SELECT MAX(open_count) AS max_opens, MIN(open_count) AS min_opens, AVG(open_count) AS avg_opens FROM open_rates
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, email_subject, open_rate FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, join_date FROM subscribers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, open_time, click_time FROM email_logs WHERE subscriber_id = 100;
SELECT campaign_id, clicked_emails, sent_emails, opened_emails FROM campaigns_performance WHERE sent_emails > 1000;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, open_rate FROM email_campaigns WHERE open_rate > 10;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, email_subject, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate >= 5 ORDER BY open_rate DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name, email_subject FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM email_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate > open_rate AND click_through_rate > 5 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM emails LIMIT 5;
SELECT recipient_email, open_rate FROM emails WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT recipient_id, email FROM recipients WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE open_rate > 0.1 AND click_through_rate > 0.05;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE total_recipients < 5000;
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM recipients WHERE subscription_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, recipient_id, joining_date FROM campaigns_recipients WHERE joining_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT email_id, recipient_email, campaign_id, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM emails JOIN campaigns_recipients ON emails.campaign_id = campaigns_recipients.campaign_id WHERE click_through_rate > 0.1 AND interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY open_rate DESC, click_through_rate DESC;
